Text: Jounen Kwéyòl:  Most people commemorate this day by wearing the island's National Wear such as the Wob Dwiete.
Triplets:<Jounen Kwéyòl
5:
--------------------
Text: Jounen Kwéyòl:  Persons who do not want to wear the extreme layers of skirts and dresses make clothing out of special plaid material called Madras which is one of the cloths used in the national wear.
Triplets:<Jounen Kwéyòl
